verses.text: 1 "JESUS_END"Be ye followers of me, even as I also am of Christ.
2 "JESUS_END"Now I praise you, brethren, that ye remember me in all things, and keep the ordinances, as I delivered them to you.
3 "JESUS_END"But I would have you know, that the head of every man is Christ; and the head of the woman is the man; and the head of Christ is God.
4 "JESUS_END"Every man praying or prophesying, having his head covered, dishonoureth his head.
5 "JESUS_END"But every woman that prayeth or prophesieth with her head uncovered dishonoureth her head: for that is even all one as if she were shaven.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-11-6/" title="1 Corinthians 11:6 KJV verse detail"><span id="8" class="versehover">6  "JESUS_END"For if the woman be not covered, let her also be shorn: but if it be a shame for a woman to be shorn or shaven, let her be covered.
7 "JESUS_END"For a man indeed ought not to cover his head, forasmuch as he is the image and glory of God: but the woman is the glory of the man.
<a href="../1-Corinthians-11-8/" title="1 Corinthians 11:8 KJV verse detail"><span id="10" class="versehover">8  "JESUS_END"For the man is not of the woman; but the woman of the man.
<a href="../1-Corinthians-11-9/" title="1 Corinthians 11:9 KJV verse detail"><span id="11" class="versehover">9  "JESUS_END"Neither was the man created for the woman; but the woman for the man.
10 "JESUS_END"For this cause ought the woman to have power on her head because of the angels.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-11-11/" title="1 Corinthians 11:11 KJV verse detail"><span id="13" class="versehover">11  "JESUS_END"Nevertheless neither is the man without the woman, neither the woman without the man, in the Lord.
12 "JESUS_END"For as the woman is of the man, even so is the man also by the woman; but all things of God.
<a href="../1-Corinthians-11-13/" title="1 Corinthians 11:13 KJV verse detail"><span id="15" class="versehover">13  "JESUS_END"Judge in yourselves: is it comely that a woman pray unto God uncovered?

<a href="../1-Corinthians-11-14/" title="1 Corinthians 11:14 KJV verse detail"><span id="16" class="versehover">14  "JESUS_END"Doth not even nature itself teach you, that, if a man have long hair, it is a shame unto him?
15 "JESUS_END"But if a woman have long hair, it is a glory to her: for her hair is given her for a covering.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-11-16/" title="1 Corinthians 11:16 KJV verse detail"><span id="18" class="versehover">16  "JESUS_END"But if any man seem to be contentious, we have no such custom, neither the churches of God.
17 "JESUS_END"Now in this that I declare unto you I praise you not, that ye come together not for the better, but for the worse.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-11-18/" title="1 Corinthians 11:18 KJV verse detail"><span id="20" class="versehover">18  "JESUS_END"For first of all, when ye come together in the church, I hear that there be divisions among you; and I partly believe it.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-11-19/" title="1 Corinthians 11:19 KJV verse detail"><span id="21" class="versehover">19  "JESUS_END"For there must be also heresies among you, that they which are approved may be made manifest among you.
20 "JESUS_END"When ye come together therefore into one place, this is not to eat the Lord's supper.
21 "JESUS_END"For in eating every one taketh before other his own supper: and one is hungry, and another is drunken.
22 "JESUS_END"What? have ye not houses to eat and to drink in? or despise ye the church of God, and shame them that have not? What shall I say to you? shall I praise you in this? I praise you not.
23 "JESUS_END"For I have received of the Lord that which also I delivered unto you, That the Lord Jesus the same night in which he was betrayed took bread:
24 "JESUS_END"And when he had given thanks, he brake it, and said, "JESUS_START" Take, eat: this is my body, which is broken for you: this do in remembrance of me. "JESUS_END"

25 "JESUS_END"After the same manner also he took the cup, when he had supped, saying, "JESUS_START" This cup is the new testament in my blood: this do ye, as oft as ye drink it, in remembrance of me. "JESUS_END"

<a href="../1-Corinthians-11-26/" title="1 Corinthians 11:26 KJV verse detail"><span id="28" class="versehover">26  "JESUS_END"For as often as ye eat this bread, and drink this cup, ye do shew the Lord's death till he come.
27 "JESUS_END"Wherefore whosoever shall eat this bread, and drink this cup of the Lord, unworthily, shall be guilty of the body and blood of the Lord.
28 "JESUS_END"But let a man examine himself, and so let him eat of that bread, and drink of that cup.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-11-29/" title="1 Corinthians 11:29 KJV verse detail"><span id="31" class="versehover">29  "JESUS_END"For he that eateth and drinketh unworthily, eateth and drinketh damnation to himself, not discerning the Lord's body.
30 "JESUS_END"For this cause many are weak and sickly among you, and many sleep.
<a href="../1-Corinthians-11-31/" title="1 Corinthians 11:31 KJV verse detail"><span id="33" class="versehover">31  "JESUS_END"For if we would judge ourselves, we should not be judged.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-11-32/" title="1 Corinthians 11:32 KJV verse detail"><span id="34" class="versehover">32  "JESUS_END"But when we are judged, we are chastened of the Lord, that we should not be condemned with the world.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-11-33/" title="1 Corinthians 11:33 KJV verse detail"><span id="35" class="versehover">33  "JESUS_END"Wherefore, my brethren, when ye come together to eat, tarry one for another.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-11-34/" title="1 Corinthians 11:34 KJV verse detail"><span id="36" class="versehover">34  "JESUS_END"And if any man hunger, let him eat at home; that ye come not together unto condemnation. And the rest will I set in order when I come.
